snippet: The Rockets’ James Harden became tangled with LeBron James during Houston’s victory on Sunday, and as James fell back to the court, he kicked James.
abstract: NBA Roundup; league suspends Houston Rockets guard James Harden for one game without pay for kicking LeBron James in the groin during game against the Cleveland Cavaliers; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Rockets’ James Harden became tangled with LeBron James during Houston’s victory on Sunday, and as James fell back to the court, he kicked James.

headline.main: Harden to Miss One Game for Kicking Cavs’ James on Court
headline.print_headline: Harden to Miss One Game for Kicking James on Court
